topic.title: Configure Qodana
topic.p: This section contains reference pages to help you configure %product% for your needs. These pages cover only general configuration parameters. Configuring various CI/CD systems is explained in the Integration with CI systems section guides.
Generally, you can configure %product% on two levels:

list.li: Profile configuration specifies how %product% will inspect your code. This includes such topics as what inspections to use, what files and directories to inspect, how to configure license inspection.
The Docker image configuration section explains how to configure %product% Docker image for specific tasks and needs and provides basic use-cases when these options may come in handy.
